summary: Sometime in the distant future, a fledgling band gets an opportunity for a breakthrough, if they can make it in time to a faraway planet to perform in a very popular club.
cast: Dru-Anne Perry|Gina Calabrese|Linda Kerridge|Shayne Farris|Anthony Kentz|Christian Andrews|Mary-Anne Graves|Jeff Yesko|Eric Bartsch|Brian Maguire|Don Barnhart Jr.|Angela O'Neill|Steve Donmyer|Jacki Easton Toelle|Tanya Papanicolas|Laurie McIntosh
director: Director: Albert Pyun (as Albert F. Pyun)
title: El planeta del placer
